nodes.text: The Near Pando system was located in the Hutt Space portion of the Slice. It contained the trade world Near Pando and lay on the Pando Spur hyperlane that connected it to the world of Far Pando.
The Near Pando system was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square S-14.
